verses.name: Nehemiah 2:10
verses.text: When Sanballat the Horonite, and Tobiah the servant, the Ammonite, heard of it, it grieved them exceedingly that there was come a man to seek the welfare of the children of Israel.

verses.name: Nehemiah 2:11
verses.text: So I came to Jerusalem, and was there three days.

verses.name: Nehemiah 2:12
verses.text: And I arose in the night, I and some few men with me; neither told I any man what my God had put in my heart to do at Jerusalem: neither was there any beast with me, save the beast that I rode upon.
